overview:
Ammar Ahmed Siddiqui has expertise in N-Tier architecture both on Microsoft and Sun Platform and he also specializes in incorporation of third party tools and technologies in various applications.

He joined Business Technologies as Project Manager in 2003 and has played a key role in the development of the companyâ€™s business projects. He is fully involved in development planning, business development and management matters and most importantly he leads the companyâ€™s software developersâ€™ team to produce cutting edge software applications using .NET framework along with other technologies.

He did his Masters in Multimedia and has professional working experience for 10 plus years, which includes working at leading software houses. He has further polished his skills by attaining various certifications in the field of Information Technology
